purpleculture_pinyin:
jí
to gather up; to collect; to edit; to compile
собрать; собирать; редактировать; Скомпилировать
purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 辑)
Pictophonetic: 咠 indicates the sound; 車 (cart) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples: 輯錄 [ jí lù ]: to compile; to collect
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 車 [ chē ] cart, vehicle; to move in a cart
    • 咠 [ qì ] to whisper, to slander, to blame
heisig_chinese_memo: The advertisement for a cheap Porsche car made my mouth drop open. I heard later with my ears that it was an editing mistake.
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: To edit for a car magazine you have to be able to listen to listen to the writers opinions with your ears and give back comments with your mouth.
humanum_full_description_en:
From the " car ", the sound of "咠". The original meaning of "Suo Wen" is "Che He Ji", "Suo Wen": "Edit, Che and Ji Ye. From Che, Biao Sheng." Duan Yucai changed to "Che Yu", the note: "Each edition It’s a big mistake to make "Chehe Jiye". It's right now. From "轈" seal and above, all car names, from "Yu" seal to "軜" seal are all car incidents, and there is no such thing as "Chehe". ... "Liezi. Tang Wen Pian" Tang Yin Jingshun explained the quotation from "Shu Wen" "Edition, Che Yu Ye", and what the Yin family saw was correct." Duan Note quoted in "Lie Zi. "Tang Wen": "Pushing Yuya, Qi Ji is almost bridle, and eagerly the lips and kisses, and the rest is in the chest, and the control is the leisure." Yin Jingshun explained: "Said "The text" says: "Edition, Che Yu also." In this statement, the father is good at imperial, and the neatness of Che Yu lies in the bridle."

Said a " series " of the original meaning is "and series", that is gathered. Zhang Shunhui's "Shuowen Jiezi Yue Annotation": "The words of the compilation are also, saying that all the talents are gathered together, and they must be harmonized before they can be used. Therefore, Xu Jun trained the compilation with "Chehe Ji". "Kao Gong Ji" says: "Those who gather together with one tool have more cars." Since cars are made by many hands, the length, size, wideness, narrowness, and smoothness of the materials must be harmonious and then able to travel far and heavy.... "Liezi. Soup" Questions" Yin Jingshun interprets the quotation from "Shu Wen", made "Edition, Che Yu Ye". Gai Yanyu's seal explanation is wrong. The two seals are inherited, and the quotation is chaotic. Duan's note is based on this Change the Xu book, no.” An example such as "Mandarin. "Zhou Yu": "He Xie Ji Mu is therefore almost Xing." Wei Zhao's Note: "Edit, gather also." "Han Fei Zi. "Speaking of the Forest": "On the tenth day of rain, the first series will gather soldiers, and the Wu people will come. It is better to prepare."

" Edit " is extended to mean harmony and harmony. Such as Yinqueshan Han Bamboo Slips "Sun Bin Art of War. "Weiwang Questions" Jane 279: "Pei Lai Guangzhi, rigorously compile the masses." Organizer's note: "Compilation, collection also. Compile the masses, unite the scholars and make one heart." "Huainanzi. This Sutra: "The ancient saint king is on top, politics and education are peaceful, benevolence and harmony, the top and bottom are of one mind, the ruler and the ministers are harmonious, there is plenty of food and clothing, and the home is sufficient."

" Edit " means convergence and convergence. Such as "Shang Shu. "Shun Dian": "Look at the mountains and rivers, all over the gods, compile the five radiances." Kong Chuan: "Compile, converge." "Song Da Ji": "The son, the doctor, the rod is outside the bedroom door, and the bedroom door is compiled inside." Zheng Xuan's note: "To compile, to converge. The one who converges, it is said that it is not a pillar."

" Edit " means editing. Such as "Han Shu. "Yiwenzhi": "The master was born, and his disciples were complied with the compilation, so it is called "The Analects"." "Wen Xin Diao Long. Calligraphy: "Cangjie, edited by Li Sizhi, and the remains of Niaoxian."

" Edit " is wanted for " wanted ", which means serialization. Such as "Han Feizi. "Foreign Chu said the upper left": "Chu people sell their pearls to Zheng. They are the casseroles of magnolia, cinnamon peppers, jewels, roses, and emeralds."

humanum_full_description:
從「車」，「咠」聲。今本《說文》本義是「車和輯」，《說文》：「輯，車和輯也。从車，咠聲。」段玉裁改為「車輿」，注云：「各本作『車和輯也』，大誤。今正。自『轈』篆以上皆車名，自『輿』篆至『軜』篆皆車上事件，其閒不得有『車和』之訓。……《列子．湯問篇》唐殷敬順釋文引《說文》『輯，車輿也』，殷氏所見未誤。」段注所引見《列子．湯問》：「推於御也，齊輯乎轡銜之際，而急緩乎脣吻之和，正度乎胸臆之中，而執節乎掌握之閒。」殷敬順釋文：「《說文》云：『輯，車輿也。』此言造父善御，得車輿之齊整在於轡銜之際。」

　　一說「輯」的本義為「和輯」，即聚集。張舜徽《說文解字約注》：「輯之言𠓛也，謂合眾材所聚，必和調而後能用，故許君以『車和輯』訓輯。《考工記》云：『一器而聚焉者，車為多。』車既由眾手所成，則材之長短、大小、廣狹、澀滑，皆必和輯而後能行遠載重。……《列子．湯問篇》殷敬順釋文引《說文》，作『輯，車輿也』。蓋沿輿篆說解而誤。二篆相承，引書者亂之耳。段氏注本遽據此以改許書，非是。」例子如《國語．周語》：「和協輯睦於是乎興。」韋昭注：「輯，聚也。」《韓非子．說林下》：「雨十日，甲輯而兵聚，吳人必至，不如備之。」

　　「輯」引申表示和睦、調和。如銀雀山漢簡《孫臏兵法．威王問》簡279：「埤壘廣志，嚴正輯眾。」整理者注：「輯，集也。輯眾，團結士眾，使之一心。」《淮南子．本經》：「古者聖王在上，政教平，仁愛洽，上下同心，君臣輯睦，衣食有餘，家給人足。」

　　「輯」表示斂、收斂。如《尚書．舜典》：「望于山川，遍于群神，輯五瑞。」孔傳：「輯，斂也。」《禮記．喪大記》：「子、大夫寢門之外杖，寢門之內輯之。」鄭玄注：「輯，斂也。斂者，謂舉之不以柱地也。」

　　「輯」表示編輯。如《漢書．藝文志》：「夫子既卒，門人相與輯而論篹，故謂之《論語》。」《文心雕龍．練字》：「《蒼頡》者，李斯之所輯，而鳥籀之遺體也。」

　　「輯」通「緝」，表示連綴。如《韓非子．外儲說左上》：「楚人有賣其珠於鄭者，為木蘭之櫝，薰以桂椒，綴以珠玉，飾以玫瑰，輯以翡翠。」
humanum_short_description: 從「車」，「咠」聲。今本《說文》本義是「車和輯」，段玉裁改為「車輿」。一說「輯」的本義為「和輯」，即聚集。

    • 咠 [ qì ] to whisper, to slander, to blame

(Simplified: 辑)
Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 咠 indicates the sound; 車 (cart) conveys the meaning.
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 車 [ chē ] cart, vehicle; to move in a cart
    • 咠 [ qì ] to whisper, to slander, to blame
①聚集，特指聚集材料編書：輯錄。輯要。輯逸。編輯。纂輯。
②聚集很多材料而成的書刊：叢書第一輯。
③和，和睦：輯睦。
④斂，拖着不便脫落。
⑤古同“緝”，連綴。
⑥古代稱協調駕車的衆馬。
輯錄 [ jí lù ]: to compile; to collect

Kind: traditional

Seal characters (1)

輯字的基本解释

輯
jí
见“辑”。

輯字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jí］
［《廣韻》秦入切，入緝，從。］
“辑1”的繁体字。“緝2”的被通假字。亦作“揖2”。
(1)车舆。
(2)敛，收敛。
(3)和悦；和睦。
(4)安定；使安定。
(5)成。
(6)聚合，集聚。
(7)纂集；编辑。
(8)指整套书籍的一部分。
(9)整修，补合。
(10)通“緝”。连缀。
(11)通“楫”。划船的桨。参见“輯濯”。
(12)通“戢”。参见“輯首”。

輯字的康熙字典解释

【酉集下】【車字部】　輯； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页1246第05
【廣韻】【韻會】【正韻】?秦入切，音集。【說文】車和輯也。【六書故】合材爲車咸相得謂之輯。　又【玉篇】和也。【正韻】睦也。【書·湯誓】輯寧爾邦家。　又吐辭和好曰輯。【詩·大雅】辭之輯矣。　又顏色和柔亦曰輯。【詩·大雅】輯柔爾顏。　又斂也。【書·舜典】輯五瑞。【禮·檀弓】蒙袂輯屨。【註】力憊不能斂屨也。　又與集通。【前漢·郊祀歌】澤汪濊，輯萬國。　又與楫通。【前漢·兒寬傳】統楫羣元。【註】楫，聚也。當作輯。又【公孫弘傳】發輯濯士。【註】輯，本從木，其音同耳。　又與揖通。【晉語】君輯大夫就車。【註】輯作揖。

輯字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
輯字的起名意思

暂无。

(3) Harmony; harmony.
(4) Stability; make stability.

(7) Compilation; editing.
(8) Refers to a part of a complete set of books.
(9) Renovation and repair.
(10) Wanted to be "wanted". put together.
(11) Through "楫". Rowing oars. See "Editing Zhuo".
(12) Linked with "戢". See "Edit First".
